Name: Cut Cut Buffet
About the game: Cut Cut Buffet is a slicing simulator for the ages, cut your way through mounds of food and multiple game modes. Can you stand the heat of the kitchen? Features: - 3 game modes with more on the way - 2 difficulties per mode - Realistic cutting mechanic - Cut all kinds of foods - Fish - Immersive restaurant environment - Multiple Weapons - Developer updates Game Modes: 1. Survival Mode - Cut as long as possible and avoid the bombs 2. Time Mode - Cut as much as possible while avoiding bombs 3. Practice Mode - Hone your skills in a relaxed infinite setting
